text: Only extract those words from a list that include no repeating letters, using regex
I have a large word list file with one word per line.
I would like to filter out the words with repeating alphabets.

code:
INPUT:
  abducts
  abe
  abeam
  abel
  abele

OUTPUT:
  abducts
  abe
  abel

text: I'd like to do this using Regex (grep or perl or python).
